frontmatter.mitle: ONLY a GENIUS CAN SOLVE THESE in 30s! (99% FAIL)
frontmatter.description: Are you the one who constantly achieved the best grades in school? Do you consider yourself as the genius of well due to this? If yes, then sorry to disappoint you but your school grades are not in any way a reflection of your intelligence. Studies mainly focus on rote learning, while the inner intelligence can be attributed to your ability to solve some of the most difficult questions that have been devised to challenge people. These questions will apparently be very short and sweet, but once you sit to actually decipher their answer, you will realize that you have to put a lot of mental effort to prove your smartness.
